Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Strongbox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Strongbox
public class Strongbox
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to represents a strongbox in player board. It can store an unlimited number of standard resources.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.EnumMap<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resources
    Map representing the resources contained in the strongbox

    Strongbox()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addResources​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
    Puts resources obtained after activating a production into the strongbox merging them with map of resources already owned.
    ReducedStrongbox getReducedVersion()
    Produces a simplified version of strongbox used by client.
    java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> getResources()
    Returns the map representing resources currently owned.
    void takeResources​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
    This method removes a certain quantity of resources from the strongbox

  • Constructor Details

    • Strongbox

      public Strongbox()

  • Method Details

    • addResources

      public void addResources​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resources) throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
      Puts resources obtained after activating a production into the strongbox merging them with map of resources already owned.
      Parameters:
      resources - that have to be stored
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the map that as to be merged is not compliant with the strongbox.

    • takeResources

      public void takeResources​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resources) throws StrongboxOutOfBoundException
      This method removes a certain quantity of resources from the strongbox
      Parameters:
      resources - map of resources that has to be taken from the strongbox
      Throws:
      StrongboxOutOfBoundException - if the action requires more than how much is owned for at least one kind of resource

    • getReducedVersion

      public ReducedStrongbox getReducedVersion()
      Produces a simplified version of strongbox used by client.

    • getResources

      public java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> getResources()
      Returns the map representing resources currently owned.
